ygData.subject: RE: Getting my EQ fix any way I can (gee, this got real long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yep. I know that. Just wondering how reliable it is generally for guards. ... Ugh. Sounds like fun. :) ... Yeah. I ve considered this. I plan on scouting
ygData.messageBody:
> As suggested previously, con them...if they give you
> anything other than indifferent, they can see you.

Yep. I know that. Just wondering how reliable it is generally for guards.

> Gather Shadows is REALLY flaky. Maybe i just have bad
> luck, but it will wear off sometimes even before the
> spell effects are finished swirling around me. And in
> some places, its just horrible. In N Ro, oasis, and S
> Ro, im lucky if it lasts 30 seconds. Cazic Thule and
> Guk also dont treat my invis with much respect.

Ugh. Sounds like fun. :)

> I would STRONGLY suggest against binding in Oggok.
> Ogers dont like humans regardless of the fact that we
> are SKs. And the Bouncers see thru Shadows all the
> time. Plus remember that when you hit your bind point,
> its usually after youre dead. No spells, no Invis at
> all. So if for some strange reason an Orge is near
> your Bind point, you may get stuck in a very nasty
> death/spawn/death loop. No pretty.

Yeah. I've considered this. I plan on scouting out the towns a little bit to
see if there is a safe place ... perhaps on top of that little tower thingie
near the zone in Grobb? If I can get up there it should be safe from guards.
Again ... this will require testing. But I would gladly test it for a couple
hours for the chance to save me a half hour run after every death.

> Feign death. <snip>
Yeah, I plan on testing this and practicing this. As I said, being the
(usually) only non-gater in my group can be troublesome when we are deep in
guk (or heck, even trying to do the thex mallet quest in befallen and get
trained ... that wasn't fun. Dying from greens stinks!).

later,
jer
